item.title: Las Olas Art Fair
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I just want to let everyone know that Christine (my wife) is going to be showing and selling her work over at the Las Olas Art Fair in Ft. Lauderdale this weekend (Labor Day). Those who are interested be sure to stop by and say hi!
item.excerpt:encoded: I just want to let everyone know that Christine (my wife) is going to be showing and selling her work over at the Las Olas Art Fair in Ft. Lauderdale this weekend (Labor Day). Those who are interested be sure to stop by and say hi!
